title: Project-Based Learning Design Integrating Generative AI and Social Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: In a BYOD environment, learners engage in generative AI-driven social problem-solving projects, emphasizing relational approaches, pedagogical responsiveness, collaborative learning, and context-based inquiry.

learning_goals: Learners can complete a step-by-step project analyzing community issues using generative AI tools.
Learners can evaluate the reliability of AI-generated content and apply ethical usage principles.
Learners can improve project deliverables by incorporating peer feedback in the PBL (Problem-Based Learning) process.
Learners can critically discuss the impact of AI technology on educational and social systems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
